mapper.select: select MB.MC_BOARD_SEQ AS MC_BOARD_SEQ , MB.TITLE AS TITLE , MB.REGISTRY_DATE AS REGISTRY_DATE , MB.AUTHORITY_ID AS AUTHORITY_ID , MB.VIEWS AS VIEWS , MM.NAME AS NAME from MC_BOARD MB INNER JOIN MC_MEMBER MM ON MB.MEMBER_SEQ = MM.MEMBER_SEQ WHERE MB.CATEGORY = #{CATEGORY}

select MB.MC_BOARD_SEQ AS MC_BOARD_SEQ , MB.TITLE AS TITLE , MB.CONTENT AS CONTENT , MB.REGISTRY_DATE AS REGISTRY_DATE , MB.AUTHORITY_ID AS AUTHORITY_ID , MB.VIEWS AS VIEWS , MM.NAME AS NAME from MC_BOARD MB INNER JOIN MC_MEMBER MM ON MB.MEMBER_SEQ = MM.MEMBER_SEQ WHERE MB.MC_BOARD_SEQ = #{MC_BOARD_SEQ}
